meta.description: Lynne D. Kitei, M.D., is an internationally acclaimed physician & health educator for over 50 years, who pushed aside her accomplished medical career to pursue answers for the silent, massive aerial “objects” witnessed by over 10,000 on 3.13.1997 for over a dozen hours and over four states! She also filmed these UAP, called the Phoenix Lights, up close & personal prior to, then during & after what is hailed as the most witnessed, most documented & most important mass UFO sightings in modern history.

title: Lynne D. Kitei M.D.
cleaned_text:
Lynne D. Kitei, M.D., is an internationally acclaimed physician & health educator for over 50 years, who pushed aside her accomplished medical career to pursue answers for the silent, massive aerial “objects” witnessed by over 10,000 on 3.13.1997 for over a dozen hours and over four states! She also filmed these UAP, called the Phoenix Lights, up close & personal prior to, then during & after what is hailed as the most witnessed, most documented & most important mass UFO sightings in modern history.

Dr. Lynne was Chief Clinical Consultant of the Imaging-Prevention-Wellness Center at the world-renowned AZ Heart Institute until coming forward in 2004, after seven years of anonymity & intense research, as a key Phoenix Lights witness. She has appeared on hundreds of national/international TV & radio Shows, including C2C AM, the History, Science, CW, Travel, Discovery & National Geographic Channels.
